query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Production with industry of small-size prototypes of μ-RWELLs
result.description: Small-size μ-RWELL prototypes will be produced by industry under the guidance and supervision of the research team. A complete report will be provided (Task 7.3)

result.description: Document establishing the concept of PED Innovation Atelier to be applied, and further containing an overview of formal and less formal organisation typologies that fit the requirements of PED Innovation Atelier to be shaped in Cities.
